name: Totally Cool Boys
description:
Based off a true story - Totally Cool Boys tells the ancient tale of friendship, the struggles and hardships of finding a true friend persisting through scrutiny. Experience an adventure of a lifetime by feigning the role of a Cool Boy with your new-found bud.

Key Features:

  • Make your own style with 169 possible action combinations! Nice.
  • Make a friend! Cause sometimes you need one

[Play Time : 2 - 4 min]

Created by  Reece L Jones 

& 

Some Cool Boys

Character Sprites by Ethan Dunnett

Background by Sethius Brosnan

Music by Bensound

This is an autobiographical experience about how I made most of my friends, by being cool (but not actually). Thanks for checking out this short experience.
